sections.projects_sub: I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are a few of my favorites.

community.title: Non-Profit Support
community.description: I believe that design and technology have the power to create meaningful connections and amplify positive change. I'm dedicated to leveraging my skills in branding, web development, and strategy to support organizations that build bridges between companies and individuals, fostering collaborative efforts that create real impact.
community.motto: Good design moves hearts, builds trust, and amplifies impact. If your mission helps others, I’d love to help you make it real.
community.note: Requests are reviewed individually based on impact, vision and community scope.

blog.title: Coming soon
blog.description: I’m building a proper writing space. Articles and case studies will start rolling out soon.

contact.title: Let's get in touch
contact.ok: Thanks! I’ll get back to you soon.

sections.skills_sub: A focused mix of people skills and technical depth.
sections.skills_footnote: Open to learn new technologies and adapt fast to change.

resume.name: Manu
resume.description: I'm a Frontend Developer with a passion for bringing ideas to life through code. I specialize in crafting clean design systems and building fast, scalable digital experiences that users love. While my primary focus is on the front end, my background also includes experience as a Full-Stack Developer (MERN stack), which gives me a holistic understanding of web development.
resume.summary: I thrive on designing and building modern web interfaces using Next.js, React, and TypeScript. There's nothing more satisfying than seeing a concept evolve into a polished, intuitive user interface. I enjoy collaborating with mission-driven teams, applying product thinking, and meticulously refining that last 10% that transforms a good UI into a truly exceptional one.

work.title: UI Developer
work.description:
Initially assigned to a secondary project focused on static web content generation within Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) and SDL Tridion, contributing to the CMS migration from Tridion to AEM. Created and maintained Content Fragments, Experience Fragments, dynamic components, Disclosures, and Articles following enterprise content governance processes.
Proactively identified code issues during content delivery, collaborated directly with frontend developers to communicate root causes and proposed solutions. This strengthened cross-team reliability and improved delivery accuracy.
Although my current focus is content management and UI implementation, my long-term goal remains building software that helps individuals and organizations enhance infrastructure, streamline processes, and achieve measurable, planned results.

work.title: Software Engineer / ServiceNow Developer
work.description: Developed and maintained internal client platforms using Angular 7, Material UI, and Node.js within a microservices architecture. Built modular and testable components, improving scalability and reliability. Wrote unit tests with Jest and Mocha, and implemented monitoring dashboards with Grafana and Splunk for real-time incident detection and alerting. Expanded into ServiceNow, earning System Administrator certification and specializing in ITSM automation, incident tracking, and workflow optimization.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Redesigned and implemented dynamic front-end components for real-time messaging and SMS campaign dashboards using React, Redux, and Sass. Collaborated closely with backend teams to integrate REST APIs, improving system reliability and user experience. Focused on code maintainability, modular UI design, and responsiveness across devices to enhance client engagement and conversion rates.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Managed and optimized product and campaign landing pages using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Worked alongside UX designers to align visuals and layout consistency with brand guidelines. Automated repetitive content publishing tasks, reducing manual operations by 40%. Contributed to improving page load times and user experience through layout optimization and performance audits.

projects.title: Chat Collect
projects.description: A small SaaS to collect emails from your GPT users. Grow an audience and monetize your GPT usage.

projects.title: UI Kit
projects.description: Designed, developed and sold animated UI components for developers.

projects.title: llm_report
projects.description: Open-source logging & analytics for OpenAI: track API requests, analyze costs, and improve prompts.

projects.title: Automatic Chat
projects.description: AI customer-support chatbot that auto-replies to tickets using modern GPT models.
